institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
contents: Article 27 (Holding Time) ① Pursuant to Article 25, Paragraph 1 of the Enforcement Decree, in principle, the national competition shall be held in September of each year and the local competition in April of each year, but the president may adjust the holding period of the domestic competition. , ② Adjustment of the holding date pursuant to the proviso to paragraph 1 must be made before the date of announcement.
